code: import React,{useState,useMemo}from"react";import papers from"../data/papers.json";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Papers(){const[query,setQuery]=useState("");const filteredPapers=useMemo(()=>{const sorted=[...papers].sort((a,b)=>new Date(b.date)-new Date(a.date));if(!query)return sorted.slice(0,10);return sorted.filter(p=>p.title.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase())||p.authors.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase()));},[query]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6 max-w-6xl mx-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-[#cc0033] mb-6 text-center",children:"Research Papers"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-8 text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search by title or author...",value:query,onChange:e=>setQuery(e.target.value),className:"border border-gray-300 p-2 rounded w-full max-w-md"}),!query&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-500 mt-2",children:"Showing 10 most recent papers by default."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6",children:filteredPapers.map((p,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white shadow rounded-xl p-5 border border-gray-200 text-left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-lg font-bold mb-1",children:p.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600 mb-1",children:p.authors}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-xs text-gray-400 mb-2",children:p.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:p.link,className:"text-blue-600 hover:underline",target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:"View Paper"})]},idx))})]});}
